DOC.brief_summary: Single-center study , randomize , double-blind , placebo control , patient undergo diagnostic therapeutic catheterization via transradial approach . Patients randomize two group : one group receive vasodilator nitroglycerin procedure ( intervention group ) , second group receive saline 0.9 % volume time procedure ( control group ) . Will evaluate : incidence spasm radial artery , ability perform procedure without need change access site , pain present patient , time total radiation procedure .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Clinical Trial Comparing Transradial Catheterization With Without Spasmolytic Drugs
DOC.criteria: Indication cardiac catheterization Suitable candidate transradial approach AMI Intubated patient Complications procedure ( cardiac arrest , pulmonary edema , cardiogenic shock , stroke ) Prior inclusion trial
